meta_title: Cycle Counts: The 2026 Framework for 99.9% Inventory Accuracy
meta_description: Inaccurate inventory leads to 70% of maintenance delays. Mastering cycle counts with Factory AI ensures your plant never stops for a missing part.
title: The Definitive Guide to Cycle Counts: Eliminating Plant Shutdowns with Factory AI

hero_image.alt: Hero image for The Definitive Guide to Cycle Counts: Eliminating Plant Shutdowns with Factory AI

image_prompt: A professional, photo-realistic wide shot of a modern, clean industrial warehouse and manufacturing floor. In the foreground, a diverse group of three maintenance professionals (one woman, two men) are collaborating. They are wearing clean, high-visibility vests, hard hats, and safety glasses. One person is holding a ruggedized industrial tablet, but only the back of the device is visible to the camera. They are standing near a well-organized racking system with labeled bins of MRO spare parts like motors and gearboxes. The lighting is bright and natural, highlighting a "brownfield" environment that looks efficient and technologically advanced. No text or screens are visible. Full-body shots of the workers.
